title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.31 - Bringing or keeping empty or partially empty containers of oil, paint or varnish in terminal prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.31 - Bringing or keeping empty or partially empty containers of oil, paint or varnish in terminal prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall bring or cause to be brought into or
keep in a truck terminal any container which has been emptied or partially
emptied of oil, paint or varnish (except as part of a
shipment). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
